Not my artwork, [but the artist posted the light form to /r/Lux a few days ago,](https://www.reddit.com/r/lux/comments/5g619i/drew_a_chibi_elementalist_lux_light_form_shall_i/) and they had since made the other three. Wanted to share those since TMiracle, also on the subreddit, was featured.
Oh! Thanks for the clarification. =) My mistake!
If i wanted to see community creations for league ill just go to rule 34 you fks

What's wrong with you?

This is a collection of talented community artists' art pieces, and you're insulting both them and Riot. Furthermore, the content that you're mentioning isn't appropriate on the Boards.
Thank the artists for doing a great job or leave them constructive feedback, or give thanks to Riot for compiling this art together and showcasing it. Don't comment if your goal is to hurt other people.
I wholeheartedly agree
Would have sent in my hand-drawn PoS Fire Elementalist standing in front of a Rift Gate, but no camera... RIP my fame.
All the artists made some awesome works of art! Thank you for sharing their works!
